text: Boris Petrovich Khimichev (Борис Петрович Химичев; 12 January 1933 – 14 September 2014) was a Ukrainian-born Russian actor. He was named a People's Artist of Russia in 1993. Khimichev was known for his roles in Aty-baty, shli soldaty..., The Ballad of the Valiant Knight Ivanhoe, and in TASS Is Authorized to Declare.... Khimichev died at the age of 81 from a brain tumor. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Russia Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Disease-related deaths in Moscow Category:Russian movie actors Category:Ukrainian movie actors Category:Khmelnytskyi Oblast
title: Boris Khimichev
